El crédito lo requiere para comprar material de construcción: cemento, ladrillos, fierro. Así podrá levantar una habitación para sus hijos y brindarle mayor comodidad.

El sueño de Verónica es tener su casita propia.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Veronica is married and has two school age children attending public school.  They live in her parents’ house located in the city of El Alto’s Villa Mercedes zone.  Veronica finished secondary school and now works as a cashier at an institution of social help in the city of La Paz.  She needs the loan to buy building materials like cement, bricks and rebar to build a room for her children so that they’ll be more comfortable.  Her dream is to have a house of her own.  This is her first loan request to Impro and to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and rebar.

loans.name: Deysi Isabel

texts.es:
Deysi es una mujer de 26 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con sus tres pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razone en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus pequeños; lamentablemente Deysi no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Secretariado, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimo Chicharrones de Chancho para compartir con su familia.

Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Deysi trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas,Deysi se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.

Deysi se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de la tramitación y documentación para la formalización de un pequeño terreno, el cual poco a poco irá construyendo para que sea su hogar, así pues Deysi seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser ve a sus pequeños convertidos en buenos profesionales y en hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Deysi is a 26-year-old woman, who lives in the city of Ica in the district of Santiago with her three young children who she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who puts all her energy into getting her family ahead in life as she acts as both mother and father for her children. Unfortunately Deysi was not able to pursue Secretarial studies as she had to work from a young age to help her parents.

In her free time, Deysi enjoys watching television, and she sometimes cooks delicious Chicharrones de Chancho (pork rinds) to share with her family. 

Upon her own initiative, and with a lot of effort and dedication, Deysi works from day to day as a farm worker in an agricultural foundation in her city. She works from early on in the morning and she can do this for approximately 10 hours. Deysi feels at ease carrying out her work and believes that it is going well thanks to her hard work and her friendly treatment of others.

Deysi is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as it is thanks to the help given that she will be able to cover the paperwork and handling costs to close a contract for a small plot of land on which she will build her home little by little. In this way, Deysi will continue working and channeling all her energy into achieving her biggest dream which is to see her children become upstanding professionals and good men.

loans.use: to cover paperwork and handling costs to close a contract for a small plot of loan.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Sra. Elizabeth vive en casa familiar de su hermano mayor; está soltera no tiene hijos, trabaja como secretaria en uno de los periodicos de la ciudad de La Paz; ella se mantiene sola 

El crédito será destinado para la compra de una laptop debido a que ella esta estudiando Contabilidad y necesita para sus trabajos y además poder acceder a un cargo mejor en su institución

Es la quinta vez que solicita un crédito en Impro. Su historial la califica como cliente buena en el pago se sus cuotas. Fue parte de Kiva en dos oportunidades; esta será la tercera vez con Kiva.

Su sueño es poder tener su propia oficina contable.
texts.en:
Elizabeth lives in her older sister’s house.  She is single and does not have children.  She works as a secretary for one of the newspapers of La Paz.  She supports herself.

The loan is to buy a laptop.  This is because she is studying accounting, and she needs it for her work.  Also, she will be able to get a better position with her institution.

This is the fifth time she is requesting a loan from IMPRO.  Her history qualifies her as a good client regarding her payments.  She was part of Kiva on two occasions, and this will be her third time with Kiva.

Her dream is to be able to have her own accounting office.

loans.use: to buy a laptop to help with her accounting studies.

loans.name: San Damian Group

texts.es:
El comité se Denomina San Damian  están en el segundo ciclo con 16  integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca  en el barrio por ser muy unidas solidarias  y responsable entre ellas.
Marta, la presidenta, es una persona muy optimista que se esfuerza por salir adelante y también anima a sus amigas a poder seguir trabajando por sus sueños y cumplirlos. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas,  y dice que le va bien ya que tiene muy buena pasta para las ventas y que así está creciendo y se está haciendo conocida.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de remeras, camisas, shorts, jeans y demás, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y dandi buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The bank is named San Damián and the 16 members are in their second cycle.  It's a group that stands out in the neighborhood for being very close, supportive, and responsible among themselves.

Marta, the president, is a very optimistic person who works hard to get ahead.  She also encourages her friends to be able to continue working toward realizing their dreams.  She makes a living selling clothing.  She says it's going well for her because she's cut out for sales, so she's growing and making a name for herself.

She's requesting this loan to buy t-shirts, shirts, shorts, jeans, and other clothing to be able to continue working and offering her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, shirts, shorts, jeans, and other clothing

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old, married, and has six children.

Maria is in the agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. Maria requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more livestock.

Maria has been raising livestock for four years now, and has borrowed 16 times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more livestock.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Myrna works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling frozen products business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from direct selling of Avon, Natasha products, etc. Myrna is borrowing 22,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional frozen products to sell for her frozen products business.

Myrna has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business in order to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional frozen products to sell

loans.name: Subhiya

texts.en:
Subhiya is a  52-year-old conservative woman.  She asked her only son to take her place in the photo.

In addition to her son Muath, Subhiya has three younger daughters. Subhiya wants to support her son as he is a university student. She applied for this loan to pay for her son’s semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s semester fees

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es:
La Sra. Andrea tiene 30 años, está soltera, vive sus padres, tiene una hija 1 año y 3 meses.
Andrea se inició hace más de ocho años en su negocio,  aproximadamente desde el año 2.004, comenzó con un capital familiar, que invirtieron en un pequeño copetín donde se dedicaron a elaborar comidas, en la actualidad tiene un bar – copetin donde concurre mucha gente, por su infraestructura misma y las comidas ricas que sirven, ya prácticamente mantiene su clientela.
Este crédito le servirá para ampliar su local para habilitar una pizzería, ya que como se ve es una persona muy trabajadora y quiere crecer.
texts.en:
Andrea is 30 years old, she is single and lives with her parents. She has one daughter who is 1 year and three months old. Over 8 years ago, in approximately 2004, Andrea started her business. She started with capital from her family, which she invested in a small restaurant where she prepares and sells food. She now has a bar and small restaurant, where she gets a lot of business; she believes she is able to maintain her clientele as a result of the infrastructure she has as well as the delicious food she serves. 

This loan will allow her to expand her local so that she can add a pizzeria. As you can see, she is a very hard working woman, and she wants to increase her business.

loans.use: to add on a pizzeria to her already existing restaurant.

loans.name: Mwasabuni

texts.en: Mwasabuni is still in his scrap metal business, and thanks to it; he has been able to place his children in school. He says that the previous loans were of great help to him. He wants to make a new investment, but he does not have enough working capital. For this sole reason, he decided to apply for a new loan, in order to buy more scrap metal for sale. He is well known and this has enabled him to have an open market for his goods.

loans.use: to to buy more scrap metal for sale.

loans.name: Al-Btol Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Btol, and consists of 5 ladies who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 160,000 YER from AMB. 

Gbla is 53 years old and lives with her family in Sana'a, Yemen. She is married and has 7 children. She sells incense and perfumes. She has been in this business for ten years and is experienced in sales, which allows her to make a better income. She works hard to offer a good life for her family. She is a resourceful, honest woman dedicated to her work. She applied for a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to buy home appliances for her house.

loans.use: to buy home appliances for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase cloth, thread, zippers, and general supplies for making clothing.

loans.name: Norena De Jesus

texts.es: Norena  de 34 años de edad, se dedica al alquiler de lavadoras desde hace 2 años, en el municipio de Malambo, área metropolitana de la ciudad, donde  tiene una clientela que la conoce como mujer de negocios desde hace 10 años,   cuando trabajó como comerciante y estableció  relaciones,  con los que hoy son sus clientes en la prestación del servicio de alquiler de máquinas para lavar. Su experiencia en la miscelánea le enseñó como manejar su mercado y poco a poco observando las necesidades de sus vecinos, inició con el  que hoy la mueve a generar  ingresos, para apoyar el sustento de su familia y especialmente de su hijo de un año de edad. Su día laboral empieza desde las 6 de la mañana, hasta las 10 de la noche o mas tarde,  si así lo requieren sus clientes, esto es justamente lo que la hace muy competitiva en el mercado. Últimamente necesita aumentar el número de lavadoras, porque hay mucha  mas demanda  de lo usual y muchos de los que pudieran ser sus nuevos clientes, se van sin el servicio, porque las lavadoras están arrendadas.  Esta es la razón por la cual acude  a un credikiva, primer financiamiento, que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará  4 lavadoras mas; con ello complacerá a su distinguida clientela y ella  también obtendrá mas utilidades, producto de su negocio. Su meta mas adelante es tener una casa propia, pero su mayor desafío es lograr el suficiente capital de trabajo para alcanzarla, de allí toda su persistencia en el trabajo.
texts.en:
Norena, 34, has earned her living renting out washing machines for the past two years in the neighborhood of Malambo, a metropolitan area of the city. 

She has customers who have known her as a business woman, working as a merchant and networking, over the past 10 years. Today those customers are customers of her laundromat. Her experience in these fields was a result of managing the market, little by little observing the needs of her neighbors. 

She started the business with what motivates her to earn more money, sustaining her family and her 1 year-old child. Her work day begins from 6 in the morning until 10 at night or later. If its what the customer need it that way, she will do it to be competitive in the market. 

Lately, she needs to increase the number of washing machines because there is a larger demand than usual, and many could become new customers. They are leaving without using the service because they are rented. For this reason, she is requesting a Kiva loan, the first, made by "La Fundación Mario Santo Domingo" (The Mario Santo Domingo Foundation). 

She will use this loan to buy 4 more washing machines. With these machines, she will please her distinguished clientele and have more utilities, the products of her business. 

Her future goal is to have her own house, but her greatest challenge is to earn enough money from her business. She is very persistent in her work to reach that dream.

loans.use: to buy four more washing machines.

loans.name: Carlos José

texts.es:
La actividad del Señor Carlos es de servicio de transporte urbano, trabaja con un triciclo que funciono de forma manual,  trasladando sus clientes de un lugar a otro.

Su negocio lo inicia con parte de capital propio y un crédito pequeño que le otorgo Ceprodel, con este dinero  compro  un triciclo.

Es casado tiene una humilde familia, cuatro niños menores en  edad escolar. Con el  esfuerzo  de  su  trabajo y ayuda de los financiamientos ha podido hacer su propia casa.

Pero ahora se acerca de nuevo a Ceprodel para le otorguemos un préstamo ya que necesita realizar unas mejoras en su hogar.

Este crédito lo solicita para compra de materiales de construcción como arena y cemento para terminar su casa.

Se siente muy contento con Ceprodel y kiva que gracias a ellos ha hecho realidad sus sueños y el de su familia tener un techo propio.
texts.en:
Carlos' business is an urban transportation service. He works with a manual tricycle, moving his clients from one place to another. 

He started his business with his own capital and a small loan that Ceprodel gave him, and with this money he bought a tricycle. 

He is married and has a humble family of four young school-aged children. Through the effort of his work and the help of the loans he has been able to build his own house. 

But now he approaches Ceprodel again for a loan, since he needs to make some improvements to his home. 

He is asking for this loan to buy construction materials such as sand and cement in order to finish his house. 

He is very happy with Ceprodel and Kiva, since thanks to them he has made his dream, and that of his family, a reality - to have their own home.

loans.use: to purchase sand and cement

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Auxiliadora es asalariada trabaja en el sector más duro de la alcaldía en barrido de calle de madrugada, tiene 11 años de trabajar en dicha empresa, un día de labor para ella empieza desde las tres de la madrugada hasta las seis de la mañana,  poco a poco ha venido solicitando financiamientos y comprando materiales para componer su vivienda, en la actualidad su solicitud le fue aprobada y aprovecho para levantar el frente su su casa ya que lo que ella sueña es tener su casa bien bonita.
texts.en: Auxiliadora is an employee that works in the toughest department of the municipality which is sweeping the streets early in the morning, she's worked there for 11 years, a regular work day for her beings at 3 AM and ends at 6 AM, little by little she has been requesting financing and buying materials to fix her house, currently her loan request was approved and she took advantage of it to build the front part of her house because she dreams with having beautiful home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her house, concrete, stone, sand.

loans.name: Juntos Unidos Iremos Al Camino Del Éxito "juice" Group

texts.es: ¡Hola! Desde Perú, Rosa es la tesorera del grupo denominado JUICE (“Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino del Éxito”), es la persona que se encuentra en la parte derecha de la foto que viste con chompa azul y además está acompañada de su hijo que viste de polo amarillo. Este grupo está conformado por 12 integrantes, los cuales son muy carismáticos y positivos. Rosa es casada y tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales solo uno es menor de edad y se le puede visualizar en la foto. La Sra. Rosa tiene un negocio de Cabinas de Internet y conjuntamente a esta actividad ella vende productos de belleza;  El préstamo solicitado es con la finalidad de comprar nuevos equipos y así tener un negocio eficiente y también poder abastecerse con algunos productos de belleza para tener en stock. Rosa está feliz de saber que diferentes personas le brindan apoyo y agradece de corazón por la motivación que le brinda KIVA y EDAPROSPO a través de los préstamos.
texts.en: Hello from Peru! Rosa is the treasurer of the group named JUICE (“Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino de Exito” which means together united we will go on the path of success).  She is the person on the right side of the photo who is dressed in a blue sweater and accompanied by her son who is wearing a yellow shirt.  This group is made up of 12 members who are very charismatic and positive.  Rosa is married and has 3 children, only one of whom is a minor and can be seen in the photo.  Rosa has an Internet café business and together with this activity she sells beauty products.  The requested loan is for the purpose of buying new equipment so she can have an efficient business and also to be able to stock up on some beauty products.  Rosa is happy to know that different people have provided support and she is grateful from her heart for the motivation that Kiva and EDAPROSPO have provided through the loans.

loans.use: to buy new equipment for her Internet business and beauty products.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité "Kuña Guapa"tiene mas de 2 años de formación y trabajo con al Fundación, vienen ayudándose y también creciendo con las capacitaciones que van recibiendo a medida que pasan los ciclos.
La Sra. Laudelina es una  integrante de éste comité , se unió al grupo por la necesidad de tener una ayuda que le permita generar mas ingresos, para solventar los diversos gastos del hogar, y también la educación de sus hijos. Ella vende comestibles de todo tipo y solicita de este crédito para la compra de los insumos que necesita para poder seguir adelante e ir creciendo, como ser carne, condimentos, verduras y demás, agradece por la ayuda que recibe, ya que le será muy útil.
texts.en:
Kuña Guapa Communal Bank worked with the foundation to form more than two years ago.  They keep helping each other and also growing with the training they receive during the cycles.

Laudelina is a member of this bank.  She joined the group because she needed help that would allow her to earn more income to pay the various household expenses and her children's educational expenses.

She sells all types of food and is requesting this loan to buy supplies she needs to be able to get ahead and grow.  She'll buy meat, condiments, vegetables, and other food.

She's grateful for the help she receives because it's going to be very useful to her.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, vegetables, and other supplies

loans.name: Medarda

texts.en:
Medarda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a furniture-making business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional wood for her furniture-making business.

NWTF is re-listing Medarda's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional wood for her furniture-making business.

loans.name: Fatena

texts.en: Fatena is a  28-year-old single lady who has been living with her mother after her father passed away. Her brother and sister are married. To be able to support herself and her mother, Fatena sells clothing items at home to neighbors and friends. She has applied for this youth loan in order to get a new winter clothing collection to sell.

loans.use: to get a new winter clothing collection to sell.

loans.name: Jannat

texts.en:
Ms. Jannat is a 51-year-old married woman and a mother of eight children. For 12 years, Jannat has been running a business of milk sales. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. 

With the passage of time, her sales increased and also her income. Now she has three buffaloes and two cows. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. 

She is in her second loan cycle with Kashf Foundation. Her repayment behavior is very good. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got by sending her children to school for studies. She wants her daughter to get an education along with her sons, and also wants to see her daughter as a teacher. 

She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Abdel Mouin

texts.en: Abdel Mouin is a 52-year-old Lebanese man living with his wife and two children; both children attend school. He has been working as a teacher in one of the local Lebanese schools. This is the only source of income for his family. He works days and nights to bring sufficient income and better support the family financially. Today, Abdel Mouin is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to pay his children’s educational fees. His only target is to ensure a good education level for his children  and to ensure his family's financial stability. In the future, he is planning to get a second job in order to earn additional income and meet the family needs.

loans.use: to pay his children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Rio Claro Group

texts.es: Karen es miembro del Grupo Solidario Rio Claro, tiene 27 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, cosméticos y también se dedica a la costura, oficio que aprendió cuando saco un curso de corte y confección, por lo que ella pensó en comprar un fardo ya que sale ropa en mal estado entonces ella la repara. Karen sale a vender su mercadería a diferentes comunidades, trabaja en conjunto con su esposo y lo hacen de forma ambulante. La única dificultad que presenta es la zona donde vive ya que esta expuesta a la inseguridad. Ella solicita este préstamo para comprar un fardo de ropa usada y así surtir su negocio de estilos actuales y acordes a la temporada, además de comprar cosméticos para vender. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá llamar la atención de más clientes y seguirá teniendo una actividad económica que le permita cubrir los gastos para la manutención de su familia. Su sueño es establecer su negocio en su casa tener un local propio e instalar una academia para enseñar costura. Karen recibirá su primer financiamiento en FAMA y espera cumplir puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Karen is a member of the borrower group Rio Claro.  She is twenty-seven years old, is married, and has two children.  Her husband works in agriculture.  She makes a living selling second-hand clothes, cosmetics, and also in sewing.  She learned how to sew when she took a dressmaking class.  She then thought to buy a bundle of clothing, and since the clothes are in poor condition, she repairs them. 

Karen sells her merchandise in different communities, working alongside her husband and traveling to her customers to sell.  The only difficulty is that the area where she lives in insecure.  She is asking for this loan to buy a bundle of used clothing and thereby supply her business with current and in-season styles.  She will also buy cosmetics to sell.  

With the support of this loan she will be able to attract more customers and she will continue having an economic activity that allows her to cover the expenses to maintain her family.  

Her dream is to establish her business in her home, to have her own place to sell, and to begin a school to teach sewing.  Karen will receive her first financing from FAMA and hopes to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres “Mujeres Unidas” está integrado por 12 mujeres de la misma zona y todas antiguas dentro del comité. Las señoras son muy unidas, responsables y solidarias, cuentan que tienen muchas ganas de trabajar y salir adelante, tanto con el grupo y familiarmente.
Una de las miembros de este grupo es la Sra. Elisa, que también es la presidenta del grupo, ella con mucho esfuerzo ayuda a su familia y también a sus compañeras del grupo, es una persona que desea salir adelante y eso se ve con el empeño que siempre pone. Se dedica a la venta de prendas de toda clase y este negocio la ayuda mucho.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, para poder seguir con sus ventas y también poder tener una buena variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mujeres Unidas Communal Bank is made up of 12 women from the same area who are all longstanding members of the bank.  The women are very close, responsible, and supportive.  They say they very much want to work and get ahead, both in the group and in their families.

One of the group members is Elisa, who is also the president.  She works very hard to help her family and her fellow group members.  She's a person who wants to get ahead, which is evident in the effort she always makes.  She makes a living selling all types of clothes, and this business helps her a lot.

She's requesting this loan to buy summer clothing to be able to continue with her sales and have a good variety to offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy summer clothes

loans.name: Lorewo

texts.en:
Lorewo, 26, lives at Sinkor with her husband and two children, who are between the ages of 2 and 9. Only one of the children is in school. 

For the past five years, she has been selling hinges, nails, door locks, and paint brushes. She learned to sell from her brother and received the initial capital from her brother to start in this business.  She makes a profit when she sells, and with the profit generated from the business, she buys more goods to improve the business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more door locks, nails, and hinges for the business. 

Her plans for the future are to buy land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more door locks, nails, and hinges for her business.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta, 33, is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be a social and honest woman. 

She operates a food stall where she sells food. Her business is located within a slum and her primary customers are residents from the slum. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the lack of enough funds for improving the business. 

She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy food ingredients for preparing meals to sell to customers (within the slum). Her business goal is to expand her food stall within five years. 

She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business so as to make sure her customers' needs are met. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients to prepare meals to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables, onions, tomatoes and potatoes.

loans.name: Arwa

texts.en: Arwa, a 22-year-old single lady, lives with her family of six members. Arwa is the oldest sister. She has two younger brothers and one sister. One of her brothers works as a bus controller and the other is a university student like her. Having two members in the family attending college puts financial pressure on the family so she has applied for an educational loan to pay part of her and her brother’s semester fees. She hopes that after getting her BA degree in English language, she could find a suitable job as a teacher or in another field using her major.

loans.use: to pay her semester fees.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 25 years old, married and a mother of two children. For the last three years, she has earned a living by selling farm produce in Mpeketoni, Lamu. She earns a monthly income of KES 18,000. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer and is applying for her fifth loan of KES 40,000 to buy seeds, fertilizer and insecticides needed for her business. 

Grace will use the profits made possible by this loan to pay for her children's school fees as well as to expand her farming activities. Her goal for the future is to venture into mixed farming with a view toward increasing her income so as to help improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy seeds, some fertilizer and other farm inputs needed for her business.

loans.name: Nuwaier

texts.en: Nuwaier, a 52-year-old housewife, is a mother of five daughters and one son between the ages of 14 and 20. Nuwaier has a daughter in the university that she wants to support so she applied for this educational loan to pay her daughter’s semester fees.

loans.use: to pay her daughter’s semester fees.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 39 years old, married and has one child. He owns a motorbike which he uses to transport people within his area and has been in business for three years. He also earns an income through farming. Faulu Kenya has helped him learn how to save his money. 
He wishes to expand his business and requires a loan of 42,727.50 KES to buy spare parts for his motorbike.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorbike.

loans.name: Jimnah

texts.en:
Jimnah is 48 years old.  He is married and blessed with four children. He has been in the carpentry business for 22 years and earns a monthly income of KES.15,700.

He is now applying for his second loan of KES.100,000 with KADET LTD., and he intends to purchase varnish and timber for his carpentry business.
The anticipated profits will be used to pay school fees for his children. He hopes to grow his workshop and expand it.

loans.use: to purchase varnish and timber for his carpentry business.

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en: Walaa is a 19 year-old single lady. She only has an older brother. Walaa is now a second year university student. She has applied for this loan in order to pay for her upcoming semester fees so she can graduate and start working to support herself and achieve more in her studies.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian lives in the coastal region of Kenya, in the town of Msambweni. She is 27 years old and is single.  She has a two year-old son. She is a fighter who has the zeal to get ahead in life. Vivian is one of the few young women who do not fear challenges. She believes that hard work pays, and she knows that her efforts will not go unrewarded. She is currently running a food stall that is located in the market. Vivian is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for preparing foods.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing foods.

loans.name: Lázaro  Ramón

texts.es:
Lázaro Ramón tiene 39 años de edad, acompañado y tiene dos hijos bajo su cargo ambos en edad escolar, es originario de Estelí, una ciudad muy linda e importante ubicada en el norte de Nicaragua.

El señor Lázaro es una persona muy responsable con buenos principio cristiano, honesto comprometido con su familia.

Actualmente se desempeña como responsable de bodega de una empresa de servicio de acueducto y alcantarillado  con más de cuatro años de servicio, con los ingreso de su salario lo utiliza para suplir los gasto del hogar de su familia.

Con el crédito que solicita a ceprodel lo va destinar para los gasto de la graduación de su hijo ya que se gradúa de bachiller, pago de pre matricula para ingresar a la universidad  y compra de útiles escolares.

Lázaro manifiesta que se siente feliz con el apoyo que se le esta brindando por parte de kiva y cepordel ya que de esa manera él puede brindarle todo el apoyo y derecho de estudiar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lázaro Ramón is 39 years old. He has a partner, and he has two children in his care, both of them school-aged. He is a native of Estelí, a very beautiful and important city located in the north of Nicaragua.

Lázaro is a very responsible person with good Christian principles, honest and committed to his family.

Currently he works as a warehouse manager in a pipe and sewer service company, with more than four years of service. With the income from his salary, he covers the household expenses of his family.

He is going to use the loan he is requesting from Ceprodel to pay for the graduation expenses of his son, since he is graduating from secondary school, as well as to pay the pre-matriculation fees to enter college and buy school supplies.

Lázaro says that he is happy with the support that Kiva and Ceprodel are providing to him, since through it he can provide his children with full support and a right to education.

loans.use: pay for his son's graduation expenses and pre-matriculation fees

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Herland Rony

texts.es: El Sr. Herland tiene 29 años tiene un hijo que tiene la edad de  4 años, el se dedica a la venta de variedad de refrescos en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de Flamingo de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Herland va a utilizar este préstamo para compra de variedad de refrescos al por mayor y de una heladera para mantener los refrescos fríos, su razón para solicitar este préstamo la falta de efectivo para la compra ya que esta época es de mucho calor y tiene mucha demanda de sus productos , El Sr. Herland enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que existen muchos puestos de venta de refrescos por  la zona,  va a utilizar los beneficios en tener un capital de inversión, su deseo es de tener un snak donde pueda ofrecer variedad de jugos, café y variedad de repostería y así incrementar su ganancias.
texts.en:
Herland, 29, has a son who is four years old. He makes a living selling an assortment of soft drinks in his sales stand located in the zone of Flamingo, in the city of Santa Cruz. 

This loan is his first loan cycle within the institution. Herland is going to use this loan for the purchase of an assortment of wholesale soft drinks and a fridge to keep the soft drinks cold. The reason he is requesting this loan is that he lacks cash for the purchase, and since this time of year is very hot, there is a high demand for his products. 

Herland faces challenges in his business such as competition, since there are many soft drink sales stands in the area.

He is going to use his profits to have capital for investment. His wish is to have a snack stand where he can offer an assortment of juices, coffee and a variety of pastries - that way he can increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of soft drinks wholesale, and to buy a fridge

loans.name: Sidney

texts.es: Saludos desde Perú, Sidney es una estudiante de 25 años, es soltera. Ella se educa en un Instituto de Nivel Superior y ejerce la carrera de Diseño Gráfico. Ella es muy carismática y extrovertida, lo cual le ayuda a desenvolverse mejor como persona. Sidney trabaja de forma independientemente sobre su carrera. Además nos comenta que utilizara el préstamo para poder solventar los gastos de sus pensiones del Instituto y así poder estudiar con tranquilidad y ahínco. Ella agradece a todas las personas que a través de instituciones como KIVA y Edaprospo la ayudan a poder seguir estudiando y promete esforzarse cada día más para lograr ser una gran profesional de éxito.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! Sidney is a 25-year-old single student.  She attends the Instituto de Nivel Superior [Upper Level Institute] and she is majoring in graphic design.  She is very charismatic and outgoing, which helps her develop better as a person.  Sidney works independently on her career.  Also she comments that she will use the loan to be able to pay her Institute tuition expenses and to be able to be able to study in peace and with zeal.  She thanks all the people who, through Kiva and EDAPROSPO, help her to be able to continue studying and she promises to strive more each day to achieve being a successful professional.

loans.use: to pay her tuition.

loans.name: Allan

texts.en:
Allan is 35 years old. He is married and has six children. He and his wife earn their income through the sale of crops and livestock. They grow maize, beans, wheat, passion fruit and bananas. They also have cows and goats.

Allan looks forward to becoming a community knowledge worker (CKW). As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, helping them to improve their crop yields and to increase their incomes.  

With the additional money that he will earn as a CKW, Allan will pay school fees for his children. He dreams of owning more land.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables, onions, potatoes and tomatoes

loans.name: Al-Toahd Group

texts.en:
This group is called Altoahd. It is a peaceful group that consists of three women from Hodiedh, Yemen. Their main activity is small trade.

Asia is 36 years old and the mother of one child. She sells incense, perfumes and clothes to the women of the area.  She started her business when she was divorced by her husband.  This new loan will allow her to buy some incense and perfumes to mix various scents.  She hopes to open a retail store.

loans.use: to buy some incense and perfumes for her business

loans.name: Nicodemus

texts.en:
Nicodemus is 38 years old, married and supports a family of five people. He has been  a wheat farmer for the last four years, earning a monthly income of KES. 30,000.

He is servicing his third loan from KADET LTD for KES. 80,000, which he intends to use to purchase farm inputs. The anticipated profits will be used to diversify into sheep-keeping. 

His future dream is to improve his financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 23-year-old single lady majoring in pharmacy. She is one of seven siblings living together with their parents. 

Being in a big family brings more financial pressure when talking about a university degree, so Iman decided to depend on herself by applying for this loan in order to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Muhannad

texts.en:
Muhannad, a 25 years old single guy, is the oldest among his three brothers and one sister. Muhannad has to work and study at the same time since he is the oldest. He wants to get a bachelor's degree. From his paycheck he sometimes gives an allowance to his siblings and pays some of the household bills after, of course, paying for his university fees. 

Muhannad is studying cooling and heating system. He wants to get the degree so he can find a suitable full time job or freelance work other than working part time jobs. He now has applied for this educational loan as he faces some shortage when paying the semester fees.

loans.use: To pay for his semester fees

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a 36-year-old farmer in Kitale county in Kenya where he lives with his wife and six children, five of whom are in school. He has been in farming for the past fourteen years producing poultry, horticultural products, and maize which he sells at the local market in his area.

Fredrick is requesting a 62,400 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. With the money he gets after selling the milk he will be able to uplift his living standards, provide milk for his children, and also use some of the money to pay their school fees. He aspires to own more dairy cows which will be able to produce fifty litres of milk per day in the next five years.

Animal feeds during dry periods and diseases are some of his major challenges in farming.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Luis Walter

texts.es:
Luis Walter tiene 39 años de edad es casado tiene 4 hijos vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito I, perteneciente a la parroquia Puerto Pechiche Cantón pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol Gandul. 

Luis Walter se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz,  arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras.   
Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. 

El sueño es comprarse una finca. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor. "Esta muy agradecido por el crédito anterior porque le ha servido de mucho".
texts.en:
Luis Walter is 39 years old and is married with four sons. He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. 

He is a member of the JERUSALEN community bank, located in Caimito I district, in the Puerto Pechiche parish of Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Luis Walter makes his living in agriculture, growing corn and rice. He is requesting a loan to buy pesticides, urea, liquid weed-killer and fertilizers. 

With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for his crops. He will buy the products he needs in the city of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.
The challenges he faces are pests and bad weather. 

His dream is to buy a farm. In his free time he enjoys playing indoor soccer. He is very grateful for the previous loan because it has served him well.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, urea, liquid weed-killer and fertilizers.

loans.name: Leny

texts.es: La Sra. Leny tiene 36 años, tiene un hijo de la edad de 8 añitos que se encuentra en  edad escolar,   ella se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra la zona de Cañada el Carmen ,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Leny  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de de insumos como arroz, fideo y papa por mayor  para la elaboración de sus platillos  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de platillos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Leny va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos y así mejorando sus ingresos, La Sra. Leny es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada ya que esta es la única fuente de ingresos para la manutención de ella y de sus hijito, el deseo de la Sra. Leny es el de tener un restaurante y así brindar mayor comodidad a su clientes.
texts.en:
Leny is 36 years old. She has one son who is only 8 years old and so is school age. She sells food at her stall which is located in the Cañada el Carmen area. This is her first loan cycle in the institution. Leny will use this loan to buy supplies, such as rice, pasta and potatoes, wholesale. She will use these to prepare the dishes she sells at her stall. In this way, she can provide her customers with a variety of dishes. 

She is requesting the loan because she wants to continue improving her business. Leny will use the profits to buy more supplies and thus improve her income. Leny is a very hardworking woman. She is happy to have this opportunity as her stall is the only source of income she has to keep herself and her young son. Leny's dream is to have a restaurant which would be more comfortable for her customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies, such as rice, pasta and potatoes, wholesale

loans.name: La Bolita - 26 Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento LA BOLITA – 26 está compuesta por ocho integrantes de los cuales seis son mujeres y dos varones que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Karina tiene 25 años, tiene un hijito de la edad de 3 añitos, ella se dedica a la venta de desayunos ella vende te cafés mates y sándwich  y otros en uno de los  mercados de la zona de Tembladerani,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Karina va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus desayunos como azúcar y te y café al por mayor,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital para la compra de insumos, la Sra. Karina  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia que tiene en el mercado  en la venta de desayuno y va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir incrementando su capital de trabajo y mejora de su puesto, su deseo para su negocio es tratar de comprar otro puesto y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
The Bank of Entrepreneurship LA BOLITA – 26 is composed of eight members, of which six are women and two are men. They make their livings doing different activities. The president of the Bank is Karina. She is 25 and has a three-year-old son. 

She makes a living selling breakfasts. She sells tea, coffee, yerba mate, sandwiches, and other things in one of the markets in the zone of Tembladerani. 

This loan is her first loan cycle within the Institution. Karina is going to use the loan to buy ingredients, such as wholesale sugar, tea, and coffee, for the preparation of her breakfasts.

The reason she is requesting this loan is that she lacks capital for the purchase of ingredients. Karina faces challenges in her business such as the competition she has in the market of breakfast sales, and she is going to use her profits to continue increasing her working capital and improving her sales stand. 

Her wish for her business is to try to purchase another stand and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar, tea and coffee, for the preparation of her breakfasts

loans.name: Sandro Francisco

texts.es:
Sandro Francisco  tiene 43 años de edad es casado tiene cuatro hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en la ciudad de ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito I, perteneciente a la parroquia Puerto Pechiche Cantón pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol Gandul. 

Sandro Francisco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz,  arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras.   

Las compras y las ventas las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas.
El sueño es seguir prosperando y acceder a más crèditos. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver noticias y jugar indor. "Esta muy agradecido por el crédito anterior porque pudo comprar lo necesario para la agricultura".
texts.en:
Sandro Francisco is 43 years old. He is married and has four children. He lives with his wife and children in the city of Ventanas in Los Ríos province.

He is a member of the Jerusalem communal bank, which is located in the rural settlement of Caimito I in Puerto Pechiche parish in Pueblo Viejo canton. This bank works in short-cycle agriculture growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Sandro Francisco is a farmer and grows corn and rice. He is asking for the loan to buy insecticides, urea, weed killer spray, and manure. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for the crops.

He trades in the city of Ventanas in Los Ríos province. The challenges he faces are infestations. His dream is to continue prospering and to obtain more loans. In his free time, he likes to watch the news and play indoor soccer. He is very grateful for the previous loan because he was able to buy what he needed for farming.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides, urea, weed killer spray, and manure

loans.name: Annie Laurence

texts.fr: Agée de 42ans, Annie Laurence est mariée et mère de trois enfants scolarisés. L'aîné et le benjamin ont respectivement 21ans et 16ans. Elle vend des pagnes depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans l'un des marché du Bénin. Dans le souci d'accroître sa capacité d'approvisionnement et de couvrir les besoins de ses clients, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de maximiser son intérêt et de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en: Annie Laurence is 42 years of age, married, and a mother to three children who are at school. Her oldest child is 21, while the youngest is 16 years of age. She has worked for a number of years selling pagnes [traditional wrap-around cloth], and gets her supplies in a market in Benin. In order to increase her supply capacity and cover her customers' needs, Annie Laurence has requested and obtained a loan from Finadev. She will use this loan to maximize her business, as well as to provide for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy 30 pagnes [traditional wrap-around cloth]

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Elias

texts.fr:
Monsieur Elias, âgé de 45 ans, il est agriculteur des pommes de terre. Il a 5 enfants dont le plus âgé a 24 ans et le moins âgé a 10 ans. Tous ses enfants vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge. Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de trois ans de l’enseignement secondaire.
Il a commencé de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2011. Le crédit actuel lui est le deuxième et le premier est bien remboursé.
Avec ce deuxième crédit, il va acheter la semence, les engrais chimiques, les fumiers et paiera les ouvriers. La mauvaise condition climatique ou la perte de valeur des produits agricoles sont les seules difficultés de non remboursement qu’attend Monsieur Elias.  Pour accroitre son agriculture, il va utiliser les stratégies suivantes : moderniser son agriculture (en utilisant les engrais chimiques et fumiers), récolter après que les pommes de terre soient suffisamment murs, chercher les marchés. Comme ambition, il veut être un grand distributeur des produits agricoles, surtout les pommes de terre. Pour sa famille, il va améliorer sa maison d’habitation, scolariser ses enfants et acheter un véhicule.
A part d’agriculture, Monsieur Elias fait aussi l’élevage.
texts.en:
Elias is 45 years of age, and works as a potato farmer. He has five children, the oldest of whom is 24 and the youngest 10 years of age. All of his children are at school, and he has no other people under his care. Elias was born in Rwanda, and he studied three years of high school education. 

Elias started collaborating with ACB Ltd in 2011. This current loan is his second, and the first loan was successfully repaid. With this second loan, he plans to buy seeds, chemical fertilizers and manure, as well as to pay his labor expenses. 

The poor weather conditions and the loss of value of his agricultural produce are the only repayment difficulties that Elias faces. To increase his agricultural business, he plans on using the following strategies: to modernize his agricultural techniques (using chemical fertilizers and manure), to harvest the potatoes once they are sufficiently ripe, and to look for new markets. Elias' ambition is to become a successful distributor of agricultural produce, particularly potatoes. For his family, he will improve their home, ensure his children's education, and purchase a vehicle. In addition to agriculture, Elias also works raising livestock.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, fertilizers, and to pay his workforce.

loans.name: Eliecer

texts.es: Eliecer, tiene la edad  de 45 años, está casado,  vive con sus 3  hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar una maquina de ordeño para una pequeña  lechería que posee. El se dedica  desde hace varios años a la ganadería y por lo cual decidió implementar en su proyecto esta nueva idea de la lechería.  El tiene pensado con este nuevo proyecto generar el máximo de las ganancias para estabilizar su economía y a su vez también ir generando los pagos de su crédito. El espera poder mejor la calidad de vida de sus hijos y esposa y tener para su futuro un ahorro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Eliecer is 45 years old and married. He lives with his 3 children and his wife who are his main priority.  With the loan, he intends to buy a milking machine for a little dairy he owns.  For several years he has earned a living with livestock which is why he decided to implement his project with this new idea of the dairy.   He thinks that with this new project he will generate maximum earnings to stabilize his financial situation and at the same time also to generate the loan payments.  He hopes to be able to improve the quality of life for his children and wife and to have savings for the future.  This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had other loans before from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan with the best terms and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a milking machine.

loans.name: Jagabalia Self Help Group

texts.en:
In 2006, 13 women from a village stepped out and formed a group named Jagabalia Self Help Group in Odisha. They help each other, share their problems and solve them together. They are celebrating their festivals together in their village.

Namita, leader of the group, has one cow. The lady standing fourth from the left in the photo wearing a red and black colored sari is Namita. She wants to purchase one new cow so that she can sell the milk in large amounts. She provides vaccine and fodder to them when it's required. She sells the milk  in her village with the help of her husband. Every morning, she takes the cow to graze in the fields and returns by noon. Then she cooks for her family.  She resumes taking care of her cow by feeding it at home. Her husband assists her in selling the milk and maintaining the cow. In this way, she is earning to control her cash flow, which is not sufficient to manage her daily activities.
	
She wants to enlarge her business, so she wants to purchase one more cow. In this way, she can earn a good amount after all the expenditure of her business. 

She has requested a loan of 195,000 INR for her group so that they can earn more and control their family's cash flow.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for her dairy business

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 25 years old. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock. He grows maize, beans, coffee, and cassava. He also has chickens and pigs.

Paul looks forward to becoming a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). As a CKW he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, helping them to improve their crop yields and to increase their incomes.  He especially looks forward to being able to provide his community with information about the weather as well as give them tips about innovative farming practices.

With the additional money that he will earn as a CKW, Paul would like to buy land where he will build a house. He dreams of finding a wife, getting married, and having children. He hopes that he will be able to educate his children and give them a good life.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Badeea

texts.en: Badeea is a 53-year-old housewife and mother to 6 sons and daughters. Her children range from 19 to 31 years old. After her husband retired, he started working as a taxi driver to support his big family. Badeea makes baskets and trays using straw and hay and sells them. Now Badeea has applied for this loan to get more raw materials and buy more fabric.

loans.use: to get more raw materials and buy more fabric.

loans.name: Friscah

texts.en:
Friscah is 54 years old, married and has three children who are all in school. She is a business woman who owns a grocery store where she sells vegetables and fruits. 

She has been in business for four years and also earns an income through farming. She is very responsible and has learned how to save through the help of Faulu Kenya.

She wishes to expand her business and requires a loan of 20,857.50 KES to buy more vegetables and fruits.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dairy goats.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi, 36, lives with her family: spouse and one five-year-old son. Naomi owns a store located in the front part of her living house, from which she sells a variety of groceries and household items. She is a very hardworking person who wants the best for her and her family's well-being. 

She is requesting a loan from Yehu to invest in the purchase of large quantities of products for the store. This would allow her to have more regular customers, a very good thing for any stable business. 

Naomi very much hopes to strengthen her business with more products, since this is what will help her to make a bigger profit and have a better life.

loans.use: to add stock of flour, basic grains, detergents, and medicines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Scola

texts.en:
Scola is 53 years old.  She is married to Antony and they are blessed with six children aged  36, 33, 30, 25, 23, 20 respectively. She has been in business for six years, in which she earns 50,000 KES monthly.  She will use the loan to purchase more tea leaves for resale. 

She will use the profit to buy land and build rental houses.  This is her second loan, and she paid her previous loan successfully.  Her hope is to increase the stock for her business and to own a home.

loans.use: To purchase processed tea leaves for resale

loans.name: Rahim

texts.en: Rahim has more than 15 years experience in the cattle business his parents own. They sell milk, cheese, and beef at a bazaar and in their local area. They also keep chickens at their farm. In addition, Rahim works as a construction worker. He is 33 years old, married, and has 2 children. Rahim's and his family live with his parents and brother.  Rahim plans to buy land and build a house for his family and to start his own agriculture business. Today he has applied for the loan to buy one cow with calf.

loans.use: To buy one cow with calf.

loans.name: Nixon

texts.en:
Nixon is taking out a new loan to expand on his existing business. He is grateful for the support given which has made him prosper in life. He can now provide the majority of the basic needs for his family without any burdens to overcome.

Nixon is currently asking for a new loan to buy ingredients for his bakery. He is sure he will achieve good results, just as what he achieved with the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for his bakery.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is married and has one child. He owns a motorbike which he uses to transport people within his area. He previously worked as a bus driver. He has learned how to save his money and has grown financially since he joined Faulu Kenya.
 
He hopes to prosper in his business and move to the motor vehicle transport business. He requires a loan of 32,298 KES to purchase a new motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike

loans.name: Sanmartin De Tours Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE TOURS”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Huarocondo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Hilda ella es casada  tiene  47 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja en su negocio de lunes a domingo desde las 06:00am hasta las 09:00pm aproximadamente, a la vez la socia vende lechón  los fines de semana  en su misma tienda de abarrotes siendo Huarocondo lugar caracterizado por vender este plato hecho a base de carne de chancho , la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como sacos de arroz para su negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de panadería, venta de maiz, tienda de abarrotes y a la venta de lechones (alimento preparado a base de carne de chancho).

Las personas  que salen en la foto adjunta son  socias que pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These partner members belong to the community bank “SAN MARTIN DE TOURS”; This bank is located in the district of Huarocondo, which belongs to the province of Anta and the administrative division of Cusco. 

One member, Hilda, 47, is married and has four children. She alternates her daily activities in her business selling groceries. She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, candy, sodas, and more. 

She has been working in this business for years, and it is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into each day in her business. She works in the business from Monday through Sunday, from 6:00am to approximately 9:00pm. At the same time, she sells lechón (suckling pig) on the weekends in her own grocery store, since Huarocondo is a place that is characterized by its sales of this dish made with a base of pork meat.

She is a responsible and determined person, and she supports her family by being this way. She is requesting the loan for the purchase of merchandise, such as sacks of rice, for her grocery store.  

The other members work in a bakery, in corn sales, in a grocery store, and selling lechones (a dish prepared with pork meat). The people who appear in the attached photos are members who requested permission to arrive late to the meeting due to work commitments.

Hilda thanks those who are part of this dream, and commits to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as sacks of rice, for her grocery store

loans.name: Meylin Auxiliadora

texts.es: Meylin de 45 anos de edad, casada con 3 hijos, del departamento de   Chinandega, lugar que esta ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Chinandega se caracteriza por ser un lugar comercialmente muy productiva. Con gente trabajadora, amable. Meylin tiene por actividad económica un bar y restaurante ubicado en su casa desde hace 16 anos que se dedica a dicha actividad. Meylin se caracteriza por ser una muy luchadora, de buenas costumbres, con ganas de superación personal. El Financiamiento lo esta solicitando para realizar mejoras a su negocio como modificar la cocina y comprar nuevas sillas. Con el objetivo brindar mejor servicio y atención a su clientela. Con el financiamiento comprara material de construcción como: arena, zinc. Cemento, perlines, pintura. Meylin agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un  medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Meylin is forty-five years old, is married, and has three children.  She is from Chinandega, an area located in the Western part of the country.  Chinandega is characterized as being a commercial and very productive place with hard-working and kind people.  Meylin has a bar and restaurant located in her home.  She has been dedicated to this activity for the past sixteen years.

Meylin is characterized as being a fighting and well-mannered woman, with hopes of personal improvement.  The financing she is requesting is to improve her business by changing the kitchen and buying new chairs, all with the objective of offering better service to her customers.  With the financing she will buy construction materials, like sand, corrugated tin roofing, cement, purlins, and paint.  

Meylin is thankful for the help that the Kiva investors have offered to her and to other people with scarce resources in poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can have a decent means of work.

loans.use: to invest in construction materials, like corrugated tin roofing, sand, cement, paint, purlins, and to buy new chairs for her restaurant.

loans.name: Bhakeswari Mahila  Samiti Group

texts.en: Satyabhama is 45 years old and has a child. She lives in the Balipatna village in Odisha, India with her husband and her child. A few years ago, she started a grocery shop where she sells rice, lentils, potatoes, wheat flour, onions, spices, soap etc. She purchases these items in the town with the help of her husband. She sells a variety of products depending on the demand in the village. She is requesting a loan to buy more supplies such as detergents, biscuits, candles, electric bulbs, wafers, toilet cleaner etc. With this investment, she will expand her business so that she can generate more income and improve the quality of life for herself and her family. She is requesting the loan with a group of 10 members who all are women who live in the same community.  They named their group Bhakeswari Mahila Samiti. They are located in the Khurda district of Odisha, India.

loans.use: to purchase detergents, biscuits, candles, electric bulbs, wafers, toilet cleaner etc. for her grocery shop.

loans.name: Shree Shree Hariharadev Self Help Group

texts.en:
Shree Shree Hariharadev Self Help Group (SHG) has 11 members who are all from the same neighbourhood. The lady sitting third from the left in the photo is Rasmita, who is the leader of the group. Rasmita is 25 years old and married to a fisherman from Balugaon village in Odisha, India. Rasmita lives with her in-laws and her husband takes care of all the household expenses. She helps her husband sell fish. Her husband goes to the lake every morning to fish and she sells those fish in the market as fresh fish and keeps some of them to dry (Drying the fish is a way of preserving the fish for future use by drying them in the sun until the water is completely evaporated) and sells them as dried fish. Demand for dried as well as fresh fish is very high in the region. 

All the members of this group are engaged in selling fresh and dried fish in the market. In order to strengthen the business and respond to client demands, Rasmita and her group Shree Shree Hariharadev Self Help Group (SHG) has requested a loan of 165,000 INR to purchase fishing nets and storage boxes to keep fish. Their goal is to increase their business activity.

loans.use: to purchse fishing nets and storage boxes to keep fish.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is 44 years old. She is married and blessed with three children. She manages rental houses in Huruma Kwamaiko in Nairobi.

She has a good credit history with KADET LTD and she is now applying for her third loan of KES 100,000. She will use the loan to renovate her rental houses and purchase farm inputs for agricultural activity.

She will use the anticipated profit to educate her children. She hopes to build more rental houses.

loans.use: to renovate houses.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 41-year-old married woman. She lives in the suburbs of Faisalabad City in a two bedroom house with her husband and five children. She runs a small town grocery store. Twice every month Shehnaz stocks her shop with high demand products that she books at the wholesalers on a week’s notice. She is an ambitious lady who works hard to provide for her family. Her husband works in a private office but his income is barely sufficient to meet the family’s needs. Shehnaz borrowed funds from Kashf to invest in her business five years ago when it was almost at the verge of liquidation. She worked hard in her store and eventually sales increased. Recently she has requested for another loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase sacks of rice, flour, and sugar and packs of beverages. It will enable her to improve her sales which will help her bring in more cash.  Shehnaz says she wants to send her children to high school for further studies so they will never live in poverty like their mother.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice, flour, and sugar and packs of beverages.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of five children from Bien Unido, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari business while her husband is a fisherman. Alma is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell in her store such as dry goods, snack foods, and toiletries, and to buy fuel for the fishing boat. 
In the future, Alma wants to expand the family business and save money for reinvestment in the same venture.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell in her store such as dry goods, snack foods, and toiletries, and to buy fuel for the fishing boat.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en: Hamisi is a 40-year-old resident of Msambweni. He is married and a father of five children: two daughters and three sons. His wife takes care of the home. For the last 15 years, Hamisi has been fishing in the Indian ocean. He later sells his fish at the market. He says that he has achieved good results. He is taking out this loan to purchase fishing nets. He hopes to have more income and continue to provide for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 49-year-old married man. He has 4 children ranging from 6 to 15 years old. He describes himself as a decisive man. He operates a carpentry shop where he sells furniture such as tables, chairs, cupboards, beds, wall units, etc. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located at a local residence and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a shortage of wood (raw materials) for making furniture. He will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy wood for making furniture to sell. His business goal is to expand his carpentry shop within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he can improve his family's standard of living. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy wood for making furniture to sell.

loans.name: Harutyun

texts.en: Harutyun is 28-year-old young man who lives with his wife and grandparents in Goris town. He works at a local company as a guard. As Harutyun is the only worker in the family, it is very difficult for him to sustain his family. Besides his work in the company, Harutyun is also involved in cattle breeding. He keeps 9 young pigs, a mother pig, and 40 lambs.  Harutyun has applied for this loan to buy 15 more lambs and expand his cattle breeding. This will help him to earn more income and continue development of his farm.

loans.use: to pay for 15 lambs

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo lives in the town of Msambweni. She is 28 years old, married, and has two children. For the last five years, she has been operating a vegetable stall, selling at the market. Her customers prefer her stall because of her fresh products and above all her unequaled services.
Mwanakombo is taking this loan to purchase tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbage, garlic and kale. By doing so, she anticipates increasing the volume of her sales and earning a better profit.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbage, garlic, and kale.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 35 years old, married, and is blessed with three children. He has operated his business for the last six years and it gives him a monthly income of 35,000 KES.

He has a good credit history and is now requesting his third loan of 100,000 KES with KADET LTD. He intends to expand his shop by purchasing more stock of cereals,sugar, and cooking fat for sale.

The anticipated profits from his business will be used to support his family and to expand his retail shop to a wholesale store. He hopes that one day he will have multiple chains of stores all over the country.

loans.use: To purchase cereals, cooking fat, and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Agim

texts.en:
Agim is forty-six years old and lives in a northern part of Kosovo. He is married and is a father of a five year old child. Agim provides transportation services with his van. He has been active in this business for eight years. His business and client base are growing steadily and he has a good reputation in the community.  

His customers are usually in his area and he has a lot of work because he is well known in his area. Agim's business is the only source of income for the family and he works hard to improve the lives of his wife and children. Recently his van broke down and Agim was unable to work and generate income. He is requesting a loan to repair his vehicle, to change the tires for winter-time, and to buy engine oil. Agim’s goal is to offer his family more comfort and to improve their standard of living. He is grateful to Kiva lenders and will continue to work hard to grow his business.

loans.use: To repair his vehicle, change the tires, and buy engine oil

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 28 years old. He lives in the Akhalkalaki District with wife and two children (5 and 6 years old).  Edgar has requested a loan from a local financial institution several times for a family business start-up, without any success. His loan request was rejected each time, because of his low income and family’s poor living conditions. 

Edgar used to have a mini-bus and transported cargo to the capital city. He was also involved in spice and seeds trading at the local open market, but the business was stopped because of financial problems. Edgar went abroad to find a suitable job there but his trip was unsuccessful and he came back to his district and decided to start a new business. Edgar purchased a well equipped store at the local open market and plans to set up a shoe store.

His loan request was approved by a new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. Start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, which do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the received loan Edgar will purchase a large variety of shoes as competition is high in the region and business won’t be successful if he doesn't have a wide choice.  The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan will significantly increase the family income and Edgar will be able to renovate his house, which is old and damaged.

loans.use: to purchase shoes for resale

loans.name: Awatef

texts.en:
Awatef is a 42-year-old housewife and is married to a public sector employee. They have three boys and one girl to support. 

As a help to support her family, Awatef buys used furniture and home appliances and resells them to others. Now she has applied for this loan in order to get more furniture and make a storage room for keeping it, other than in the yard in back of the house.

loans.use: to get more used furniture and make a storage room for keeping it.

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel is 35 years old. She is married, with three children between the ages of 6 and 16, all of whom attend school. 

Rachel wants a loan to buy rice and cooking oil. She has been in business for the past 5 years. The profits from the business will be used for savings.

loans.use: To buy more rice and cooking oil to resell.

loans.name: Clara Jaqueline

texts.es:
Clara Jaqueline  tiene 37 años de edad es casada tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos y el esposo en la ciudad de ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito I, perteneciente a la parroquia Puerto Pechiche Cantón pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol Gandul. 

Clara Jaqueline  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz,  arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras.   

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. 
El sueño es comprarse un carro y una finca. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boly, indor y escuchae música. Esta muy agradecido por la ayuda del crédito anterior.
texts.en:
Clara Jaqueline, 37, is married and has four children.  She lives with her children and her husband in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  She's a member of Jerusalén Communal Bank, located in the El Caimito I neighborhood in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, Pueblo Viejo Canton.  This communal bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Clara Jaqueline makes a living in agriculture, growing corn and rice.  She's requesting the loan to buy insecticide, urea, liquid weedkiller, and fertilizer.  With the help of the loan she'll buy the fertilizer for the plantings.

She'll make her purchases in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.  The challenges she faces are pests and bad weather.

Her dream is to buy herself a car and a farm.  In her free time she likes to listen to music and play volleyball and indoor soccer.  She's very grateful for the help from the previous loan.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, urea, weedkiller, and fertilizer

loans.name: Sujey Johanna

texts.es:
Sujey Johanna tiene 32 años de edad es madre soltera tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Rìos.
